name: Leave the Chaos Behind
description:
Leave the Chaos Behind

You are a boy who wants to escape from the chaotic city

But can you escape the chaos?

---How to play?---

• Avoid the obstacles and go as far as you can

• Use the shield to protect yourself from the obstacles

• You have 3 lifes but you can recover by collect hearts

---Controls---

- A/D or LeftArrow/RightArrow  :  move left and right

- space bar : change the shield side

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Hope you enjoy  :D
